description: This trap is generated periodically from the Beta sites
and passed on to the 3Com Trap server so that performance
of beta code can be monitored closely.

event.Summary: Betasite Statistics:- Active Calls: $v1; TotalPorts: $v2; PortUtilization: $v3%;\nCallsInLast24Hours: $v4; MemoryUtilization: $v5; Uptime: $v6; CodeVersion: $v7;\n IngressPackets: $v8; Egress Packets: $v9

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD BETASITE-MIB::usrBetaInfoTrap BETASITE-MIB::usrChassisActiveCalls i 9999 BETASITE-MIB::usrChassisTotalPorts i 9999 BETASITE-MIB::usrChassisPortUtilization i 9999 BETASITE-MIB::usrChassisCallsInLast24Hrs i 9999 BETASITE-MIB::usrRouterMemoryUtilization i 9999 BETASITE-MIB::usrRouterUptime s EXAMPLE BETASITE-MIB::usrRouterCodeVersion s EXAMPLE BETASITE-MIB::usrRouterEthInterfaceIngressPkts i 9999 BETASITE-MIB::usrRouterEthInterfaceEgressPkts i 9999

description: The number of active calls on the chassis at that moment.
variables.name: BETASITE-MIB::usrChassisActiveCalls

description: The number of ports in the chassis.
variables.name: BETASITE-MIB::usrChassisTotalPorts

description: The percent utilization of the modem ports in the chassis.
variables.name: BETASITE-MIB::usrChassisPortUtilization

description: The number of calls answered by the Hiper in last 24 hours.
variables.name: BETASITE-MIB::usrChassisCallsInLast24Hrs

description: The memory utilization of the system.
variables.name: BETASITE-MIB::usrRouterMemoryUtilization

description: The code version of Hiper Access Router Card.
variables.name: BETASITE-MIB::usrRouterCodeVersion

description: The aggregate number of incoming packets on all ethernet interfaces.
variables.name: BETASITE-MIB::usrRouterEthInterfaceIngressPkts

description: The aggregate number of outgoing packets on all ethernet interfaces.
variables.name: BETASITE-MIB::usrRouterEthInterfaceEgressPkts
